food.title: Quinoa
food.description: Quinoa is a nutrient-rich grain, high in fiber and protein, making it a healthy and versatile alternative to rice.

food.title: Beef stew
food.description: Beef stew is a hearty dish where searing the meat enhances flavor and provides a rich, satisfying meal.

food.title: Deep fried turkey
food.description: Deep-fried turkey offers moist white meat, flavorful dark meat, and crisp skin, providing a delicious alternative to roasting.

food.title: Club Sandwich
food.description: A club sandwich is a satisfying, layered sandwich with cooked poultry, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise, ideal for a balanced meal.

food.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
food.description: Chocolate chip cookies are a delightful treat known for their buttery flavor and sweet, satisfying taste, providing a quick energy boost.

food.title: Ham Burgers
food.description: Burgers, made with a ground meat patty typically beef, served in a bun with various toppings and condiments, offer a quick, customizable, and satisfying meal option.

food.title: Key lime pie
food.description: Key Lime Pie is a tangy and creamy dessert made from key lime juice, sweetened condensed milk, and egg yolks on a graham cracker crust, offering a rich source of vitamin C and antioxidants that not only satisfy your sweet tooth but also provide health benefits.

drinks.title: Mojito
drinks.description: A refreshing cocktail made with rum, lime juice, mint, sugar, and soda water.

drinks.title: Old Fashioned
drinks.description: A classic cocktail made with bourbon or rye whiskey, sugar, bitters, and a twist of citrus rind.

drinks.title: Margarita
drinks.description: A tangy cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and Cointreau or triple sec.

drinks.title: Pina Colada
drinks.description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream or milk, and pineapple juice.

drinks.title: Espresso Martini
drinks.description: A modern cocktail made with vodka, espresso, coffee liqueur, and sugar syrup.

drinks.title: Manhattan drink
drinks.description: a classic cocktail made with whiskey (typically rye or bourbon), sweet vermouth, and a dash of bitters, usually Angostura. The drink is known for its rich, smooth, and slightly sweet flavor profile.
